build.beforeDevCommand: cd ../core && cargo build && mkdir -p ../client/src-tauri/binaries && TARGET=$(rustc -vV | grep host | cut -d' ' -f2) && cp ../../target/debug/nameless-core ../client/src-tauri/binaries/nameless-core-$TARGET && cd ../client && pnpm dev:web
build.beforeBuildCommand: cd ../core && cargo build --release && mkdir -p ../client/src-tauri/binaries && TARGET=$(rustc -vV | grep host | cut -d' ' -f2) && ln -sf ../../../../target/release/nameless-core ../client/src-tauri/binaries/nameless-core-$TARGET && cd ../client && pnpm build:web
